Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to track switching problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
